channel.title: What other MMORPG should we cheat on?
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
Since Jagex has updated their RS Engine, why not cheat the sh*t out of another game? Post the game you think it would be easy to cheat on ;)
Cheers, Surajd.

item.title: What other MMORPG should we cheat on?
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

leader:

Great! Thanks for reviving an 8 month old topic.

Don’t blame me, it was on the front page when I posted so stfu

And whats the point of cheating on a pirate game when the pirates look like a bunch of lego pieces

Edit-Nevermind, the lego pirates thing is another thing I guess ><

Read full topic

@Newb_2341 wrote:

Hey, doesn’t matter, found a new one…

Guys, I recommend Puzzle Pirates, as you download a client and can extract EVERY file. Easy to hack.

Only problem - what file do we open the non known ones with?

Link --> Here.

To get into the file, My Computer, C: drive, three rings design.

item.title: What other MMORPG should we cheat on?
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

First, Stick Arena isn’t worth any effort to hack whatsoever. On top of that, there’s already hacks for pretty much everything in the game on the internet, so it’s not like spending any time to make something someone else already made would be worth it.
Anything simple wouldn’t be worth hacking either, since why would you want to make a strong botted character on a game hardly anyone plays RuneScape o.O The only good thing that comes from making private servers is that you learn/practice java, and that can help you get a job in your later years
Diablo 2 already has bots.
World of Warcraft already has detectable bots.
Guild Wars might have bots, but who cares
Quake 4 has aimbots.
Soldier Front has aimbots.
Counter Strike has aimbots.
Battlefield 2142 probably has some kind of bot.
Pretty much every game already has a bot/cheat/“helper” to it o.O
If you find something that is cheatable, try to make something out of it.
I’m just really talkative today

Read full topic

item.source: What other MMORPG should we cheat on?

item.title: What other MMORPG should we cheat on?
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“l3etal3lade, post:37, topic:3347”][code]
public void setHP(int hp)
{
if(berserk_)
{
return;
} else
{
hpMeter_.setValue(hp);
return;
}
}

public void setSP(int sp)
{
    spMeter_.setValue(sp);
}

public void setXP(int xp)
{
    xp_ = xp;
    xpMeter_.setValueAndMax(xp, xpForNextLevel_);
    xpDisplay_.setText(" " + xp);
    revalidate();
}

public void setGold(int gold)
{
    goldDisplay_.setText(gold + " gp");
    revalidate();
}

public void setFood(int food)
{
    foodMeter_.setValue(food);
}

public void setLevel(int level, int xpForLevel)
{
    level_ = level;
    xpForNextLevel_ = xpForLevel;
    xpMeter_.setValueAndMax(xp_, xpForNextLevel_);
    String text = name_ + "  (Level " + level + ')';
    nameDisplay_.setText(text);
    nameDisplay_.setToolTipText(text);
    revalidate();
}

public void setName(String name)
{
    name_ = name;
    String text = name + "  (Level " + level_ + ')';
    nameDisplay_.setText(text);
    nameDisplay_.setToolTipText(text);
    revalidate();
}

[/code]

I just found this while searching through the wyvern client XD[/quote]

Lol, hax it!

Read full topic
